CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 16, 1952, pg. 17, reads: "Weil P-TA - Some of the persons who take part in the play to be presented at the next meeting of the Weil Parent-Teachers Association are shown here in a scene from the play. They are Mrs. Lois Fenton, Charles William, Mrs. Elizabeth Tillman, Mrs. Ione Ray, Ronald Feltovich and Howard Carter. Kenneth Scott, another member of the cast, is absent from the picture. Miss Betty Alpert is director of the play. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Actors Lois Fenton, Charles William, Elizabeth Tillman, Ione Ray, Ronald Feltovich and Howard Carter performing in play on stage with prop window in background for A. Leo Weil School PTA meeting
